alert.note: Alert for Branch; Hillsdale (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 9:09PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Branch and western Hillsdale Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 908 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Reading, or 9 miles southwest of Hillsdale, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hillsdale and Jonesville around 920 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Litchfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
